function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Elevated temperature accelerating viral replication and transmission of WNV","Impact":"Increased likelihood of sustained local transmission of WNV","Mitigation":"Monitoring and controlling environmental temperature, implementing mosquito control measures","Technologies":"Environmental monitoring systems, mosquito control technologies","People":"Local populations, public health authorities","Owner":"Public health authorities, environmental agencies"},{"Description":"Link between heat waves and WNF outbreaks in Europe","Impact":"Increased cases of WNF during heat waves","Mitigation":"Early warning systems, heat wave response plans, mosquito control measures","Technologies":"Early warning systems, weather forecasting technologies, mosquito control technologies","People":"Local populations, public health authorities","Owner":"Public health authorities, meteorological agencies"},{"Description":"Correlation between temperature deviations and WNF cases","Impact":"Statistically significant correlation between high temperatures and WNF cases","Mitigation":"Improved surveillance, early detection systems, public health intervention strategies","Technologies":"Surveillance technologies, early detection systems, public health intervention technologies","People":"Epidemiologists, public health authorities","Owner":"Public health authorities, research institutions"}]}
